body_content.explanation: the fact that you no longer have something or have less of something:
examples: Many parents feel a sense of loss when their children leave home.
He suffered a gradual loss of memory.
There will be substantial job losses if the factory closes down.
He suffered hearing loss from testing aircraft engines.

body_content.explanation: a disadvantage caused by someone leaving or by something being taken away:
examples: It would be a great loss to the department if you left.
They never got over the loss of their son.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which a business spends more money than it earns:
examples: The company announced a pre-tax loss of three million dollars.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when a number of people die:
examples: The plane crashed with serious loss of life.
